body_html: I'm a bit sad that we have to insert the tests manually even though our autogenerated Python binding code is clever enough to handle this automatically. Consistency would suggest the C++ binding code should handle this too :/
body_text: I'm a bit sad that we have to insert the tests manually even though our autogenerated Python binding code is clever enough to handle this automatically. Consistency would suggest the C++ binding code should handle this too :/
